CustomField.formula: MID(Calendly__CalendlyLink__c, FIND("calendly.com/", Calendly__CalendlyLink__c) + LEN("calendly.com/"), FIND("/", Calendly__CalendlyLink__c, FIND("calendly.com/", Calendly__CalendlyLink__c) + LEN("calendly.com/")) - FIND("calendly.com/", Calendly__CalendlyLink__c) - LEN("calendly.com/"))
CustomField.label: Personal Calendly Slug
